overview: Jon Pedersen, Sr. joined SNAP Interactive as Chief Financial Officer in October 2011, where he oversees all financial, investor and management reporting functions, with a focus on increasing SNAP’s visibility within the market. Prior to SNAP, Mr. Pedersen held the positions of Senior Vice President – Controller and Vice President – Assistant Controller of Warner Music Group, where he was employed since 2005. From 2000 to 2005, Mr. Pedersen held the position of Chief Financial Officer at WestLB Securities, Inc. From 1995 to 2000, Mr. Pedersen held various positions in the accounting and finance departments of Goldman, Sachs & Co. where he achieved the title of Vice President. Mr. Pedersen holds a Bachelor of Science in Business Administration with an emphasis in Accounting from the University of Connecticut and an M.B.A. from Columbia Business School.
